hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wall Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Big Poe Bottle# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Hi! I'm currently on an exchange program from Termina.^They say that East Clock Town is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Tree Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Hookshot# and #a Goron Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.
